Actions.Name: Pack Attack
Actions.Effects: Up to three other members can dash 2, then deal 2 damage to the attack target.

Actions.Name: Hunting Tactics
Actions.Description: A [name] in range 3 of a pack member gains stealth and can dash 2.

Actions.Name: Vicious Howl
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 of a pack member is weakened. Weakened foes take 2 piercing damage instead.

Actions.Name: Drag Down
Actions.Description: A foe in range of a pack member is marked. While marked, they are weakened+ while adjacent to any pack members.
